description: Test the real-time plugin by sending all the bricks in 'dataset' to AFNI.

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.description: List of datasets to send to AFNI, specified as paths to dataset files. Multiple datasets can be specified.

host.title: Host
host.description: Send data via TCP/IP to AFNI running on the specified computer system 'sname'. Default is the current system using shared memory. Use 'localhost' to send on the current system using TCP/IP.

interval_ms.title: Inter-transmit interval
interval_ms.description: Inter-transmit interval in milliseconds. Default is to send data as fast as possible.

send_3d.title: Send in 3D
send_3d.description: Send data in 3D bricks. Default is 2D slices.

buffer_mb.title: Buffer size (MB)
buffer_mb.description: Set the interprocess communications buffer size in megabytes when using shared memory. Has no effect if using TCP/IP. Default is 1 MB; if set to 0, a 50 KB buffer is used.

swap_bytes.title: Swap byte pairs
swap_bytes.description: Swap byte pairs before sending data.

nz_fake.title: NZ Fake
nz_fake.description: Send 'nz' as the value of nzz for debugging purposes.

drive_cmd.title: Drive commands
drive_cmd.description: Send 'cmd' as a DRIVE_AFNI command. If 'cmd' contains spaces, it must be quoted. Multiple -drive options can be used.

note.title: Notes
note.description: Send 'sss' as a NOTE to the realtime plugin. Multiple -note options can be used.

yrange.title: Y-range for motion estimation graphing
yrange.description: Send value 'v' as the y-range for realtime motion estimation graphing.
